channel.title: https://fantasy11team.com/
channel.description: Platform to help build a better dream team
channel.title: Rexer - Fantasy11Team.com
channel.description: Platform to help build a better dream team

item.title: Welcome to Fantasy11team.com
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Hey! Welcome to Fantasy11test.com, it’s great to have you :)

We will be providing you great tips, previews and suggestions and lastest news which help you in building a great team. Good Luck!!

There are a few things that we will be provising on this site:

  1. News about the teams, who is in the squad, who is not playing the match, who is replacing who.
  2. Expected 11 from both the teams will be provided along with suggestions about captain and vice-captain.
  3. Our dream teams will also be published to help you out in the selection.

This website has been developed using jasper2 from the github.

item.title: AF-Y vs PK-Y Under 19 ICC 3rd Place Playoff, Today's Match, Dream Team, Prediction
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 3rd place playoff of 2018 Under 19 ICC Cricket World Cup between Afghanistan and Pakistan. Both the teams have lost their respective semi-finals of the tournament and now looking for the 3rd place.

Afghanistan will be facing the Pakistan for the 2nd time in the tournament and will be aiming for the second victort over Pakistan. Afghanistan has been a secret superstar in this season as they have lost only match. Pakistan started the season with a loss but picked up very quickly and reached the semi-final.

We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match. Heavy rain showers are expected through the course of the day.

Event Details

ICC Under 19 World Cup AF-Y vs PK-y

  • Queenstown Events Centre, Queenstown
  • Date: Jan30, 3:00 AM IST
Venue ODI Stats
  • Total matches 9
  • Matches won batting first 1
  • Matches won bowling first 6
  • Average 1st Inns scores 164
  • Average 2nd Inns scores 168
Squads
Afghanistan U19:

Naveen-ul-Haq (c), Qais Ahmad, Azmatullah Omarzai, Ikram Ali Khil (wk), Rahmanullah, Mohammad Ibrahim, Zahir Khan, Darwish Rasooli, Baheer Shah, Tariq Stanikzai, Nisar Wahdat, Wafadar, Waqarullah Ishaq, Mujeeb Zadran, Yousuf Zazai

Pakistan U19:

Muhammad Zaid Alam, Imran Shah, Rohail Nazir (wk), Ali Zaryab, Mohammad Taha, Ammad Alam, Saad Khan, Hasan Khan (c), Muhammad Musa, Shaheen Afridi, Arshad Iqbal, Suleman Shafqat, Mohammad Ali Khan, Munir Riaz, Muhammad Mohsin Khan

Key Players
Afghanistan U19:
  • Ikram Ali Khil
  • Rahmanullah
  • Mujeeb Zadran
  • Qasi Ahmed
  • Ibrahim Zadran
Pakistan U19:
  • Muhammad Musa
  • Arshad Iqbal
  • Hasan Khan
  • Shaheen Afridi
  • Ali Zaryab
Afg-Y vs Pak-Y Probable Playing XI :
Afghanistan U19:

Zahir Khan, Ikram Ali Khil (wk), Naveen-ul-Haq (c), Darwish Rasooli, Mujeeb Zadran, Nisar Wahdat, Qais Ahmad, Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah, Azmatullah, Baheer Shah

Pakistan U19:

Hasan Khan (c), Muhammad Musa, Muhammad Zaid Alam, Saad Khan, Shaheen Afridi, Rohail Nazir (wk), Mohammad Taha, Ali Zaryab , Ammad Alam, Arshad Iqbal, Imran Shah

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Both the wicket keepers are good. You can choose either one.
  • Ibrahim Zadran, Ali Zaryab, Darwish Rasooli and Rahmanullah are good choice in batting.
  • Azmatullah and Hasan Khan are all rounder selections.
  • Shaheen, Musa, Qasi and Mujeeb are the bset bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players.

item.title: Cape Cobra vs Dolphins 2nd Semi-Final Momentum Cup Dream11 Fantasy11 Preview
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 2nd semi-final of Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18. This ground is high scoring ground. We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match.

Both the teams are meeting head to head for the 3rd time in this tournament. Dolphins had won both of them leaving Cobra team thirsty for a win. Cape Cobras will be aiming to end the stranglehold the Dolphins have held over them this season when they meet in the second Momentum One-Day Cup semi-final at PPC Newlands in Cape Town today.

Event Details

Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18 Cape Cobra vs Dolphins

  • Newlands, Cape Town
  • Date: Jan 31, 5:00 PM IST
Venue ODI Stats
  • Total matches 39
  • Matches won batting first 21
  • Matches won bowling first 23
  • Average 1st Inns scores 332
  • Average 2nd Inns scores 296
Squads
Cobras:

Rory Kleinveldt (c), Dayyaan Galiem, Zubayr Hamza, Simon Khomari, George Linde, Pieter Malan, Aviwe Mgijima, Tshepo Moreki, Mthiwekhaya Nabe, Dane Piedt, Dane Paterson, Vernon Philander, Jason Smith, Kyle Verreynne.

Dolphins:

Kehsav Maharaj (c), Sarel Erwee, Senuran Muthusamy, Sibonelo Makhanya, Calvin Savage, Robert Frylinck, Athi Maposa, Zack Paruk, Prenelan Subrayen, Morne van Wyk, Dane Vilas, Smangaliso Nhlebela, Mthokozisi Shezi, Vaughn van Jaarsveld.

Team News

Dumny and Zondo will not be playin this match. Rory Kleinveldt and Keshav Maharaj will be captains instead.

Key Players
Cobras:
  • Pieter Malan
  • Dane Paterson
  • Mthiwekhaya Nabe
Dolphins:
  • Dane Vilas
  • Senuran Muthusamy
  • Keshav Maharaj
Cobras vs Dolphins Probable Playing XI :
Cobras:

Rory Kleinveldt(c), Dayyaan Galiem, Dane Paterson, Aviwe Mgijima, George Linde, Simon Khomari, Zubayr Hamza, Kyle Verreynne (wk), Pieter Malan, Mthiwekhaya Nabe, Jason Smith

Dolphins:

Morne van Wyk, Vaughn van Jaarsveld, Dane Vilas (wk), Prenelan Subrayen, Keshav Maharaj(c), Mthokozisi Shezi, Sarel Erwee, Senuran Muthusamy, Robbie Frylinck, Athi Mpendulo Maposa, Sibonelo Makhanya

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Dane Vilas is hte only good choice as wicket keeper.
  • Pieter Malan, Morne van Wyk , Sarel Erwee are good choices.
  • There is obvious choice in all rounders section - JSenuran Muthusamy and George Linde.
  • Dane Paterson, Prenelan Subrayen and Rory Kleinveldt can be selected as bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players. You can contact us for any suggestion or query.

item.title: AUK vs NK 15th Match New Zealand ODD The Ford Cup Dream 11 Fantasy 11 Dream Team Preview
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 15th Match of The Ford Cup New Zealand ODD. The match will be played between Northern Knights and Auckland. Both the teams have lost their last match so there might be some changes in the playing XI.

Auckland has won 2 of thier matches out of 4 and is on no. 2 in the point tables while Northern Knights has won 3 matches till now and is in the second spot. We will be providing you details about the probable 11, Dream 11 team, best fantasy team and the strong players from each squad.

Event Details

Ford Cup New Zealand ODD AUK vs NK

  • Cobham Oval, Whangarei
  • Date: Jan 31, 3:30 AM IST
Squads
Northern Knights:

BJ Watling, Tim Seifert(w), Nicholas Frederick Kelly, Anton Devcich, Dean Brownlie(c), Daryl Mitchell, Scott Kuggeleijn, Brett Hampton, Joe Walker, Brent Arnel, Brett Randell, James Baker, Zak Gibson

Auckland:

Jeet Raval, Graeme Beghin, Glenn Phillips(w), Sean Solia, Mark Chapman, Craig Cachopa(c), Michael Barry, Donovan Grobbelaar, Tarun Nethula, Ben Lister, Jamie Brown, Danru Ferns, Michael Guptill-Bunce, Ben Horne, Mitchell McClenaghan, Lockie Ferguson, Matt McEwan, Robert ODonnell, Aniket Parikh

Key Players
Northern Knights:
  • BJ Watling
  • Daryl Mitchell
  • Anton Devcich
  • Brent Arnel
Auckland:
  • Glenn Phillips
  • Mark Chapman
  • Tarun Nethula
AUK vs NK Probable Playing XI :
Northern Knights:

BJ Watling, Tim Seifert(w), Nicholas Frederick Kelly, Anton Devcich, Dean Brownlie(c), Daryl Mitchell, Scott Kuggeleijn, Brett Hampton, Joe Walker, Brent Arnel, Brett Randell

Auckland:

Jeet Raval, Graeme Beghin, Glenn Phillips(w), Sean Solia, Mark Chapman, Craig Cachopa(c), Michael Barry, Donovan Grobbelaar, Tarun Nethula, Ben Lister, Jamie Brown

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • For Wicket Keeper, Tim Seifert is the only choice.
  • On batting front, BJ Watling, Glenn Phillips are good chioice.
  • Anton Devcich, Daryl Mitchell and Mark Chapman good for all rounder.
  • Brett Randell and Sean Solia as bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players. You can contact us for any suggestion or query.

item.title: OTG vs WEL 14th Match New Zealand ODD The Ford Cup Dream 11 Fantasy 11 Dream Team Preview
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 14th Match of The Ford Cup New Zealand ODD. The match will be played between Wellington and Otago. Both the teams have lost their last match so there might be some changes in the playing XI.

Otago has won 2 of thier matches out of 4 and is on no. 3 in the point tables while Wellington has won only 1 match till now and is in the second last spot. We will be providing you details about the probable 11, Dream 11 team, best fantasy team and the strong players from each squad.

item.title: SA-Y vs BAN-Y Under19 5th Place Playoff Dream 11 Fantasy 11 Dream Team Preview
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 5th place playoff of ICC Under19 Cricket World Cup. The match will be played between South Africa and Bangladesh. Both the team are already out of the tournament and are fighting for the 5th place in the table. Both the teams have won their last match so there might not be any change in the playing XI.

Bangladesh was on second number in the group D and South Africa also placed itself at no. 2 in the Group A. Both the team posses good bowling attack however South Africa is strong on batting front end as well. We will be providing you details about the probable 11, Dream 11 team, best fantasy team and the strong players from each squad.

Event Details

Under19 ICC Cricket World Cup 2018 South Africa vs Bangladesh

  • Queenstown Events Centre, Queenstown
  • Date: Jan 31, 3:00 AM IST
Venue ODI Stats
  • Total matches 9
  • Matches won batting first 1
  • Matches won bowling first 6
  • Average 1st Inns scores 164
  • Average 2nd Inns scores 168
Squads
South Africa:

Jiveshan Pillay, Matthew Breetzke, Raynard van Tonder(c), Wandile Makwetu(w), Gerald Coetzee, Jean du Plessis, Jason Niemand, Kenan Smith, Andile Mokgakane, Jade de Klerk, Akhona Mnyaka, Fraser Jones, Thando Ntini, Hermann Rolfes, Kgaudise Molefe

Bangladesh:

Pinak Ghosh, Saif Hassan(c), Aminul Islam, Towhid Hridoy, Afif Hossain, Mohammad Rakib, Shakil Hossain(w), Qazi Onik, Robiul Haque, Hasan Mahmud, Tipu Sultan, Roni Hossen, Nayeem Hasan, Mahidul Islam Ankon, Mohammad Naim

Key Players
South Africa:
  • Wandile Makwetu
  • Raynard van Tonder
  • Matthew Breetzke
  • Gerald Coetzee
Bangladesh:
  • Afif Hossain
  • Towhid Hridoy
  • Qazi Onik
SA U19 vs BAN U19 Probable Playing XI :
South Africa:

Jiveshan Pillay, Matthew Breetzke, Raynard van Tonder(c), Wandile Makwetu(w), Gerald Coetzee, Jean du Plessis, Jason Niemand, Kenan Smith, Andile Mokgakane, Jade de Klerk, Akhona Mnyaka

Bangladesh:

Pinak Ghosh, Saif Hassan(c), Aminul Islam, Towhid Hridoy, Afif Hossain, Mohammad Rakib, Shakil Hossain(w), Qazi Onik, Robiul Haque, Hasan Mahmud, Tipu Sultan

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • For Wicket Keeper, Wandile Makwetu is the only choice.
  • On batting front, Matthew Breetzke, Raynard van Tonder and Towhid Hridoy are good chioice.
  • Saif Hassan can also be selected as he is a bowler also.
  • There is obvious choice in all rounders section - Afif Hossain and Hermann Rolfes.
  • Gerald Coetzee and Qazi Onik are good options as bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players. You can contact us for any suggestion or query.

item.title: Titans vs Warriors 1st Semi-Final Momentum Cup
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 1st semi-final of Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18. We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match.

TItan by far is the strongest team in the tournament with 7 wins and 2 losses and sits on top in the tournament table. Warriors are on number 4 in the table with 4 wins and 6 losses.

Event Details

Momentum One Day Cup 2017-18 Titans vs Warriors

  • SuperSport Park, Centurion
  • Date: Jan 30, 5:00 PM IST
Venue ODI Stats
  • Total matches 50
  • Matches won batting first 21
  • Matches won bowling first 27
  • Average 1st Inns scores 248
  • Average 2nd Inns scores 213
Squads
Titans:

Henry Davids, Tony de Zorzi, Rivaldo Moonsamy, Heinrich Klaasen(w), Heino Kuhn, Farhaan Behardien, Albie Morkel(c), David Wiese, Shimane Alfred Mothoa, Shaun von Berg, Junior Dala, Malusi Siboto, Dean Elgar

Warriors:

Gihahn Cloete, Lesiba Ngoepe, Edward Michael Moore, JJ Smuts(c), Yaseen Vallie, Colin Ackermann, Clyde Fortuin(w), Sisanda Magala, Andrew Birch, Ayabulela Gqamane, Anrich Nortje, Christiaan Jonker, Lutho Sipamla

Key Players
Titans:
  • Heinrich Klaasen
  • Rivaldo Moonsamy
  • Farhaan Behardien
  • Albie Morkel
Warriors:
  • Gihahn Cloete
  • Colin Ackermann
  • Anrich Nortje
  • Sisanda Magala
Titans vs Warriors Probable Playing XI :
Titans:

Henry Davids, Tony de Zorzi, Rivaldo Moonsamy, Heinrich Klaasen(w), Heino Kuhn, Farhaan Behardien, Albie Morkel(c), David Wiese, Shimane Alfred Mothoa, Shaun von Berg, Junior Dala

Warriros:

Gihahn Cloete, Lesiba Ngoepe, Edward Michael Moore, JJ Smuts(c), Yaseen Vallie, Colin Ackermann, Clyde Fortuin(w), Sisanda Magala, Andrew Birch, Ayabulela Gqamane, Anrich Nortje

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Heinrich Klaasen is better in wicket keeper section but Gihahn Cloete can also be taken in team.
  • Farhaan Behardien, Heino Kuhn , Mohammed Yaseen Vallie are good choices.
  • There is obvious choice in all rounders section - JJ Smuts, Albie Morkel, Colin Ackermann.
  • Sisanda Magala and Junior Dala can be selected as bowlers.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players. You can contact us for any suggestion or query.

item.title: IPL 2018 Auction Completed List Of Players
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
IPL 2018 auction has concluded yesterday after going on for 2 days in Bangalore, India. A big pool of 580 players went under the hammer. Total 169 players were sold for a total amount of 4,31,70,000 INR.

While most of the players are from previous season but there are new faces as well. Most expensive player of this season is Ben Stokes for an whopping amount of 12,50,00,000 INR and the most expensive Indian player is Jaydev Undakat who is auctioned for 11,50,00,000 INR.

We will provide you the list of all the players grouped by thier teams who were sold in the IPL 2018 acution.

Chennai Super Kings

item.title: ENG-Y vs NZ-Y Under 19 ICC 7th Place Playoff, Today's Match, Dream Team, Prediction
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 7th place playoff 2018 Under 19 ICC Cricket World Cup between England and New Zealand. We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match. Both New Zealand and England have lost their last match which was for the 5th position.

Event Details

ICC Under 19 World Cup Eng-Y vs NZ-y

  • Queenstown Events Centre, Queenstown
  • Date: Jan30, 3:00 AM IST
Squads
England U19:

Tom Banton, Liam Banks, Harry Brook(c), Will Jacks, Euan Woods, Finlay Trenouth, Jack Davies(w), Prem Sisodiya, Adam Finch, Ethan Bamber, Dillon Pennington, Savin Perera, Tom Scriven, Roman Walker, Luke Hollman

New Zealand U19:

Jakob Bhula, Rachin Ravindra, Finn Allen, Kaylum Boshier(c), Sandeep Patel, Dale Phillips, Luke Georgeson, Callum McLachlan(w), Felix Murray, Ben Lockrose, Matthew Fisher, Max Chu, Katene Clarke, Todd Watson, Connor Sullivan

Key Players
England U19:
  • Liam Banks
  • Will Jacks
  • Harry Brooks
  • Ethan Bamber
New Zealand U19:
  • Finn Allen
  • Felix Murray
  • Matthew Fisher
  • Jacob Bhula
  • Rachin Ravindra
Eng-Y vs NZ-Y Probable Playing XI :
England U19:

Tom Banton, Liam Banks, Harry Brook(c), Will Jacks, Euan Woods, Finlay Trenouth, Jack Davies(w), Prem Sisodiya, Adam Finch, Ethan Bamber, Dillon Pennington,

New Zealand U19:

Jakob Bhula, Rachin Ravindra, Finn Allen, Kaylum Boshier(c), Sandeep Patel, Dale Phillips, Luke Georgeson, Callum McLachlan(w), Felix Murray, Ben Lockrose, Matthew Fishe

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Both the wicket keepers are at same level and any one can be selected.
  • Finn Allen, L Banks and D Philips are good choice for batsmen.
  • In All rounders, Ravindra, Bhula, H Brooks and W Jacks are good.
  • Bamber and Fisher are the best choices

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players.
